prec=>prec  0  t,y,x  total preciptation

dlwf=>dlwf  0  t,y,x  longwave downwelling radiative flux at the surface
td2mj=>td2mj  0  t,y,x  dewpoint temp in 2m
temp=>temp  19  t,z,y,x  temperature
rh=>rh  19  t,z,y,x  relative humidity
endvars
